personal_statement_what_to_improve: It was a very brief personal statement and the candidate would have benefitted of including more detail. It also did not state why the candidate was interested in training to teach.
subject_knowledge_what_to_improve: The candidate did not cover their subject knowledge, and how it would help them train in this subject, or convey a passion for this subject.
quality_of_application_what_to_improve: More care and attention; more detailed answers.
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: There were several unaccounted for gaps in the candidate's career history.
performance_at_interview_what_to_improve: Candidate did not always answer the question, even after prompting. Answers were sometimes brief and not very well developed.
